group.summary: No information given.

group.headline: Steam's sneakiest group, the world's number one PC gaming magazine.
group.summary:
This is the buzzing, twitching nerve centre of our many-tendrilled games-playing monster.







In our chatroom, you'll be kicked or temporarily banned if you:

- Are a dick.
- Give away SPOILERZ!
- Actively promote piracy in any way (e.g. giving out names of sites, asking for links to be PM'ed)
-Complain excessively about things unrelated to and unfixable by PC Gamer. An example being TF2 updates.
-Ask for games to be gifted to you or engage in account trading
-Spam group or pm invites
-Link any undesirable content.

And perma-banned if you:

- Spam
- Link a site containing illegal torrents, downloads or other forms of piracy
- Do something we've previously kicked or temporarily banned you for
- Return with an alt account
- Use racist, sexist, homophobic or Xenophobic language.

Please note: None of the community moderators of the PCG Chat have administrator rights to the PCG TF2 Server or any PCG gameservers. If you wish to report cheaters, hackers, abuse etc then take a screenshot of the incident, get the SteamID of the offender, by typing status into the in-game developer console (enable in advanced keyboard options, open with the ` key to the left of the 1 key) and send an email to one of the PCG writers with the screenshot and SteamID so they can take action.

group.headline: Welcome To UKCS
group.summary:
UKCS: "United Kingdom Community Servers". A relaxed and fun loving community with servers running on the very best hardware available. For more information on UKCS visit our website at www.ukcs.net. UKCS has 4 CS:S Servers, 5 DoD:S Servers, 8 TF2 servers, 3 L4D Servers, 3 L4D2 Servers and a 1.6 Server. All run the Unique UKCS Server Mod. Our player's motto is "Once you've played on UKCS - you've found a second home".

group.headline: HeLLsGamers
group.summary:
HeLLsGamers is a Multi-Gaming Community that has been Growing since August 5,2005.

We have many different high performance (1000FPS) servers ranging from (but not limited to) CSS, TF2, BC2, L4D, L4D2, KF, GMOD, DODS and HL2:DM. In total we have around 36 servers, Most ranked by gameME AKA HlStatsX

We like to Thank everyone that Helps Support HG! Visit www.HeLLsGamers.com

group.headline: PC Zone: The Games And The PCs
group.summary: Hello! We're Britain's best PC gaming magazine, ever since PC Salad folded in the 90s. Come join us on our wonderful adventure, through the world of gaaaaames!

group.headline: Lethal-Zone.eu: The gaming community
group.summary:
Lethal-Zone.eu, the gaming community!
We have players from all over Europe playing on our Team Fortress 2,
Left 4 Dead, Left For Dead 2 and Counter-Strike Source servers.
Do you think we have a mod or game missing? Tell us!

group.headline: GTFOGaming.co.uk - Finest European Gaming Servers
group.summary:
The GTFOGaming steam community group is open to all members of the public. Feel free to join if you play on our servers, and spread the word about us.

Players wearing the "GTFO" tag are admins, and the tag is solely for GTFO members use. Please visit our forums if you are interested in becoming a GTFO member.

If someone is disrupting your time on GTFOGaming servers, please join the Steam Group Chat to report or alternatively visit the forums. (if applicable please take demo and note the Steam ID of user via status cmd through console)

group.headline: PC Gamer Magazine
group.summary:
PCG STEAM GROUP
This is the official steam group for PC Gamer Magazine (US). Check back regularly for updates on events, podcasts, tournaments, contests and more. Hop into one of our servers anytime and play with the PC Gamer staff each Thursday and Saturday. Make sure to join our group and chat room and stay tuned for more changes to come.




VENTRILO (voice chat)

Port: 3796

It is our goal to create the largest SDK/Mapping steam group. Please add any freinds or players with SDK hours.

group.headline: intox Gaming
group.summary:
Visit our forum @ www.intoxGaming.com

Welcome to intox Gaming! We are a multi-gaming community primarily focused on Counter-Strike: Source and Team Fortress 2.

You were invited into this group because you play CSS and/or TF2 and we think you will enjoy some of our servers!

Being invited into this group does not mean you are in the clan; wearing the 'intox' tag will result in a global ban from our servers. You must be invited into our PRIVATE group to become a full-fledged member. Become a well-known regular on our forum and servers and you just might receive an invite to the PRIVATE group. Good luck!

group.headline: Crazy TF2 MOD - TF2 extreme
group.summary:
Welcome to the TF2 Diceroll mod community!
Server address is 194.177.96.192:27025
The rules are easy: connect to the server, type diceroll in chat and youâll get random positive or negative prizes such as low gravity, speed boost, high fire rate, zero ammoâ¦ other command are kamikaze, nuke (atomic bomb) and infection for medics only

Diceroll - Allows players to use a diceroll command to try and win prizes. Many
prizes are evil, such as instant death. The logic around this feature is rather
simple. Three numbers are randomed between 1 and 6 and are added together. The
sum of those three numbers determines the prize. Prizes marked with TIME BASED
are time based prizes. Meaning, once player gets them, he will have them for
certain number of seconds. file
Prizes:
3 One Hit Kill - One of rarest prizes. One who wins this, will kill anyone in a SINGLE hit. Only ones who will survive are ones with uber charge. (TIME BASED)
4 High Fire Rate - Excessive (see Excessive feature) like feature, minus health regen and super speed. Player will be able to fire weapons a lot faster than by default.
5 Low Gravity - Self-explanatory, player will be able to jump high and leap buildings with this prize.
6 Ammo Clip Boost - The clip of current weapon will be expanded TEN TIMES the normal value. So soldier's rocket launcher will have 40 rockets in clip. However, once the clip is depleted, it will go back to normal (or if player touches refill cabinet).
7 Death - Who said 7 is a lucky number? That's not the case here, that's for sure. Instant death if player gets this prize. Even uber won't save you here.
8 High Gravity - Gravity is multiplied about 10 times. Jumping is impossible and falling off any ledge will deal fall damage.
9 Low Health - The health is reduced to 1. Painful prize but not as painful as #7, instant death.
10 Kamikaze - If kamikaze feature is enabled, player will be turned into a time bomb.
11 All Criticals - All shots will be criticals. Even if they don't appear as criticals they will still do critical damage. This prize is unavailable if tf_weapon_criticals is set to 0.
12 Empty Ammo - Player loses all ammo he has.
13 Melee Only - Player is only allowed to use melee weapon (a weapon in slot 3). He can not use weapons until he dies and respawns.
14 Ammo Refill - All ammo is refilled! A useful prize in maps where ammo is very limited.
15 Double Health - Player's health will be doubled! Great time for medics to heal the player. If player touches health/refill cabinet, his HP WILL go back to normal.
16 Speed Boost - Player will gain speed faster than scout! (TIME BASED)
17 Invisiblity - Player will become totally invisible. However, the turrets will STILL see the player. (TIME BASED)
18 Invincibility - Player will become invincible. Nothing can hurt the player, one of most useful prizes. (TIME BASED)
Hlstatsx is on!!
medic infection is ON
See ya on server :D GG@all

WantedGoV Community

group.headline: The source guys
group.summary: For all of you people who love the source and hammer editor. This group is for you

group.headline: COMING SOON!!!!
group.summary:
Video gaming and social networking have, until now, been mutually exclusive arenas in the digital world. Todayâs gamers yearn for a medium in which to network and interact with their fellow gaming enthusiasts. In this climate of connectivity, Proclique.com will provide a cutting edge, visually exciting and gamer oriented social website. Its founders are seasoned online gamers who understand the nuances and dynamics of both the gaming and networking worlds, and it is their goal to create not only a website, but a movement within the gaming community: a movement that shows the world that online gaming is not just an anti-social form of recreation, but instead a vibrant and widespread cultural phenomenon that deserves the best that technology can offer.

We are in the current stages of development, and are hopeful to be up and running in the near future. Please feel free to join us here on the Steam Community, to be notified of our upcoming progress!

Join us at #PROCLIQUE on IRC

group.headline: Save This Game VALVe
group.summary:
The greatest game - the worst support!

#The Main Problem:
A game that contains over thirty bugs, that crashes all the time, especially during wars or matches, a gameplay that has become worse and worse these days! Crashes, Lags and Bugs on every server you play!
How is this supposed to end?

Valve, please save this game!
Invite all your friends to this group, maybe we can change something! Thx mates!

Now, after one week we are over 1000 members. So, we gonna bring it to the next level!
Check the board (link below) for furhter info and !
######################
EVERYONE SIGN UP HERE
http://save-hl2dm.net/phpBB3
######################

group.headline: www.dustworld.net Professional gaming servers
group.summary:
The Resistance is a international community. Our goal is to bring together a community of players who share the same passion, Left 4 Dead!

The community consists of players who are willing to use teamwork, strategies and communication thus giving you the best gaming experience possible. If you are apart of this community you will gain various benefits. For example, you will meet new gamers who want to engage Left 4 Dead combat in a tactical manner.

Also, If you are in a game with other members of The Resistance while playing Left 4 Dead, you will have a greater chance of survival! Why you ask? Because you will not be playing with a random player who's name is "Rambo" and has a trigger happy finger. Instead, you will be playing with mature and friendly players who have one goal, to survive the outbreak in a fun and teamwork orientated way.

To be apart of The Resistance, all you have to do is register on our website (www.l4d-theresistance.com) which will acknowledge that you are apart of the community. While in-game, you are not required but recommended to add -[TR]- at the side of you're name so that other -[TR]- members recognize that you want to engage zombie killing using teamwork and tactics. Because of this, you and your teammates' will be a formidable force! For the best game play we recommend joining our servers, more information below.

You do not have to be a very serious gamer to join this Group, it's purpose is to bring players together who want to enjoy Left 4 Dead and have fun! There is no age limit to join neither any trialing involved. Anyone can join, along as you agree to engage zombie killing by using teamwork, strategies and communication!

Benefits:

Access to our L4D forum, latest news, servers and our own tournament/events!
Meet dozens of friendly L4D gamers who enjoy using teamwork and strategies!

Encouragements:

The use of The Resistance tag -[TR]- which acknowledges that you wish to use teamwork, strategies and communication.
Get involved within the community by posting on our forums, joining our steam chat and playing on our servers.

Server-List:

group.headline: VIP Reserved Slots...We're Makin' It Rain
group.summary:
Welcome to the fastest growing gaming community on the planet! We are not a clan, but a group of people who like to play ... and play to win. No Heroes is dedicated to building the most inclusive adult (18+) oriented gaming community on the planet. We do not allow any racism, bigotry, homophobic language, or sexual harassment of female players on our servers. Ever.

We have OVER TWENTY dedicated TF2 servers located all over the world on high-end, dual quad core dedicated servers. We also have Private Left 4 Dead 2 servers, Private L4D1 servers, and Ranked BFBC2 servers. More servers and more games in the near future, and this is only the beginning. Try the No Heroes experience for yourself... you won't be disappointed!

group.headline: Please take the time to read what this group is about.
group.summary: Freerstein is a serious disease that attacks your face. It usually is a curse from birth but there have been rare cases / rumours of the hair above the eyes detaching and jumping up to 2 metres through the air to find a new victim. Attempts to remove it are futile as it roots itself deep within the brain. Removing it will make you look like this poor terminal victim on the left.Thank you for taking the time to read this appeal of Freerstein and please join our appeal group.So poeple like YOU can live free from freerstein.

group.headline: Welcome to the L4DPRC group!
group.summary:
This group was started on the Steam L4D forum and is for everyone who wants to play Left 4 Dead with some nice everyday people.

Please feel free to come and join the group chat room. We organise some cracking games of L4D from there, with some of the most responsible and friendly players the community has to offer!

Quick note, PLEASE make sure you check out the chat. Because people are constantly on the lookout for vs games and players to participate in them. So dont be afraid to jump in and say hello.

Server Search Keys-
US 1- Search key is PRCUS1

group.headline: WELCOME TO MY WORLD OF FIRE, INTERNATIONAL CLAN OF HELL ON EARTH
group.summary:
A simple word has great meaning, Use words wisely, Dont you think it sound stupid when someone is treated different because their not the same as me and you. Have you ever been alone when all seems lost and no one cares a tear at night softly weep to slumbered sleep, A tear here a tear there, Still no one knows, Soon feelings over whelm, and thoughts of self harm and hate run through your mind. Know this you you are my brother and we stick together through thick and thin, Nio matter what we are all one, Welcome to BURN WITH ME my friend and brother.. TO OUR INTERNATIONAL CLAN

We are here to clean up the gaming world no hackers, no rage quiters no stalkers no haters please join with me for the great clean up!

Would you all please add (BWM) tag and make When you are online if you can will you invite people to our clan so we may grow in numbers. I am pleased to have you all here to me Lets try to make the biggest clan as we are all ready the greatest.


This clan is the one clan to rule them all. we grow daily with members from across the world. all are welcome, All games are played here by everyone so meet new friends here to join you on your game.


A new dawn is here,
No more terror or fear,
In the darkness evil does glimmer,
A new light that does shimmer,
Changeing slowly it turns,
Engulfs all and burns,
Its power grows in rage,
Set free the demons from the cage,
Let go your mortel shell,
To a light the bowls of hell.


BURN WITH ME ! Welcomes you we want to break a record, We want to be the biggest clan bring all your friends everyone is welcome. other clans or just randomly invite anyone you see.





BURN WITH ME!
BRING ALL YOUR FRIENDS TO BECOME DEMONS! LET'S RIPP APART THE GAMING COMMUNITY WITH FUN!

group.headline: The Deadeaters
group.summary:
Welcome all to our group.

Originally this group was a new group of Burn with me founded by the Wraith due the hijacking of his account. Now this group is a totaly different one from the original. We have servers, the original not, we try to keep this group alive.


This group is not only for Left 4 Dead players but also for other games like Killing floor, Counter Strike, Team Fortress2, and more

The meaning of this group is to select members for our clan the undead warriors lUWl
The clan the undead warriors is not public and can only be joined by invitation of one of the admins or officers. The lUWl clan has his own servers for Left 4 Dead and other servers will be online in a brief period.

If you like to join the undead warriors clan just ask an admin or a clanmember We will set up a versus game to see if you are worth to become a clanmember. The test will always be a versus game of Left4Dead

Clanmembers have rules they have to respect:

1. Don't ragequit, please not everyone find this funny
2. Don't insult people, no racism at all. If you leave a game say it.
3. Try to help Noobs don't kick them everyone has to be given a time to learn. Be a teamplayer, not an individual.
4. Don't kick people without a good reason and if you kick tell them why
5. become member of our site
6. Try to find members that are worth to become a lUWl clanmember and propose them to the admins
7. Set up events no matter what so that everyone has the change to know eachother
8. Try to help eachother in getting achievements or certain goals in a game
9. Respect the admins they are also only humans that can't be 24/24 hours online or every day
10. The most important rule: "It's a game, not real life, enjoy it and have fun"

Among the burn with me again members we select also officers. Officers can not do the same as an admin but they can invite members and kick them. To become an officer you have to do something special like helping to find good lUWl players for our clan, inviting members to Burn With Me Again, helping us to obtain more servers for more games, in short words "something special" If you like to become officer you have to be first did something special

Guys and Girls don't forget it's just gaming, have fun

group.headline: RaÑcÒ£eÑ & ClaÐ¿k
group.summary: No information given.

We are a Battlefield Bad Company 2 (BETA) Clan. At the moment we are around 10 people big and we are recruiting people for our clan. Check www.badcompanyaces.com for more info. we dont recruit or use our tags on steam.
And some of our members do not have steam or are not in this group

General info:

We are a interational clan and will recruit people from anywhere on the globe. the only requirement is that you have suffecient knowledge in English because teamplay is our goal. A headset or microphone for ventrilo team play is usefull but not having it but still being able to listen on ventrilo is fine too.


If you were invited into here and dont know why here could be a couple of reasons:
You are on our friendslists, seen playing bad company 2 beta, or we invited you to increase the size of the group


Our Website and forum: www.badcompanyaces.com

You can only join by joining us there.

we will have a dedicated server once the game goes live
